title: Building Blocks for Statistics
text:
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: 1  Introduction
text:
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.




Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: Correlation Matrices
text:
What are correlation matrices? Some math here.
How to test correlation matrices? Some null hypothesis testing here.
How to model correlation matrices? Some PCA, CFA, and SEM here.
How to visualize correlation matrices? This section contains some stuff about geometry and correlation space.





Hadd, Alexandria, and Joseph Lee Rodgers. 2020. Understanding Correlation Matrices. SAGE Publications.

title: References
text:
Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput.
J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.
